
## Class : mucosa of bronchiole

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0005039
 * *Label* = mucosa of bronchiole
 * *Definition* = A mucosa that is part of a bronchiole [Automatically generated definition].

 * mucous membrane of lobular bronchiole
